abstract: In a break with the University of California’s administration, faculty leaders are raising concerns about the proposed Google Books settlement.
snippet: In a break with the University of California’s administration, faculty leaders are raising concerns about the proposed Google Books settlement.
lead_paragraph: A group of prominent faculty representatives from the University of California, one of Google‘s earliest and closest allies in its plan to digitize books from major libraries, is the latest to raise concerns about important aspects of a high-profile class-action settlement between Google and groups representing authors and publishers.

headline.main: U.C. Professors Seek Changes to Google Books Deal

abstract: Microsoft and Google are exploring new strategies to save money on their expensive, power-hungry data centers.
snippet: Microsoft and Google are exploring new strategies to save money on their expensive, power-hungry data centers.
lead_paragraph: Data centers can be such touchy things.

headline.main: In the New Data Center, It’s Roofs Off and Taxes Down

abstract: For the second month in a row, Bing gains in market share, as Google and Yahoo slip.
snippet: For the second month in a row, Bing gains in market share, as Google and Yahoo slip.
lead_paragraph: It may be far too early to pop the champagne on the Microsoft campus, but a celebration with a round of beers — the good stuff — may be in order.
